documents.document: @Dance10Nico hey Nico, can I interview you for my magazine while you are out here. Would love to chat about some power rangers if you can.

Calvin is freaking adorable. Really great casting choice from the producers. #NinjaSteel @Dance10Nico
Wow @ChelseaKrost is so inspiring. What an incredible woman! She is so awesome at what she does.
I cant understand the pain right now that Arab people are feeling in the United States. But I will always fight for freedom @ASE.
@ASE you man are truly fucking incredible! Keep fighting the good fight and the good, will always come and join you! God Bless You Man!

@vanbadham wtf are alternate facts anyways. facts are facts..
The Growth Hacker’s Guide to Twitter Marketing https://t.co/4OyzeZe59r via @thesocialquant
@Itstreywheeler ill never understand what Trump is doing... forget the son for a second.
@Dance10Nico Thats just what i need.
@LoriLawest My american queer brothers and sisters, women, muslims and everyone else, need that concerns heard by The President. #WhyIMarch
Thank you @dylanmarron for reminding us that while the darkness is sometimes around us, we can see the light and beauty that is inside us.
Just Remember who you guys voted in. A guy who says he is going to fight for LGBT rights by looking into muslim immigration. #Inauguration
@B_Birkholm @THR Thats a very good question..
@LoriLawest and its up to the man of the highest office to build those bridges. I am afraid. I am scared. #Inauguration
I am a gay cis producer, with a crazy and individualistic personality! I love who i am and i always will #queerselflove

@CarrieShade if anything its the opposite.

@PowerRangerTalk this is an honestly and scary realisation, that we maybe getting a really bad film...

@thepowerscoop its nice to know when journalists are prepared.
@tallpunksteph @Barnaby_Joyce Its all good, i was wandering on what interview he said this, i found it! Really disgusting stuff.

Absolutely loving @Shane28Harte and @HavelinOfficial in @LostAndFound, So Talented and Funny!
@TDR1411 @protect_JJ @Uptomyknees what would be wrong with that?
@Itstreywheeler welcome to the wakers.
@rquantock Absolutely, students should be given the best resources to succeed.
Public Policy Should NOT be influenced by misleading stereotypes, calling unemployed is 'demeaning' at best. #Auspol #Centrelink
Hey @LyleShelton, if you have any information that we may want to know, please share.. #lyleshelton #acl https://t.co/Qt9Rp9CjKD
@jamtakinson have to agree with you there.
@ijmorley @EEL__55 trust me, there is more of an existing threat out there for the kids wellbeing, and its not safe schools.
@JoshTheBanjoMan @gary67r i dont think its propaganda if everyone agrees that you cant turn a kid gay just by education lol, nice try.
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine it was nice talking to you as well, in the words of Rihanna, shine bright like a diamond.
@cammypeterson yeah, that was always going to happen, shame that conservative was just a basic troll.
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine will my friend be proud of who you are. Let your twitter bio shine the light of many hetero rainbows.
@cammypeterson are you talking to me? If so, sorry, that other person blocked me. So i wouldnt know lol
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine No! Of course not, where is your Ru Paul's fabulousness. Celebrate your twitters pride! Please be more gay.
@angrysocialst oh no, i just think your crazy. But then again thats just me and my meaningless life talking.
@Dom_Zeppelin10 To be fair, thats a great imitation of saying random things that make no sense. #GoodForYou #SafeSchools
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine i havent once labelled you as anything, Should i be?... Do you want me to be more stereotypically left?
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine what slur lol?... i dont believe i shaded you with a slur.
@angrysocialst ... Pedophile Enabler Ayy?! I think i need one more, to win my bingo name, "How To Be A Twitter Troll About Safe Schools".
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine is my twitter to gay for you. LOL
@caramaigray need to fight against misinformation about the program.
@ConnorParker While this is true, part of the reason is because of the ridiculous misreporting from some in the media.
@HappyBaz @mirandadevine can you explain to me why, using facts and not random based thoughts?
Absolutely agree with this. https://t.co/FrNYAJPl7O
@EEL__55 oh and by the way, i am not gender fluid, i am a guy. just thought you may want to know.
@EEL__55 .... Well you escalated quickly. lol
@EEL__55 Please explain the brainwashing. Thanks.
The media's obsession with unfair reporting of Safe Schools is becoming really crazy, do your fucking job!
@aussieguy30 talk to me on facebook.
@aussieguy30 connect using social, and go to networking events, also would be good not to block people like me on facebook...
Hey @MarriageAll, Is this true? doesnt this go against your protect the child from propaganda stuff you guys pull? https://t.co/zMC00q7vCj
@aussieguy30 Train hard and network and then you might get there.
@MrSlightly74 Are you a teacher? I am so confused...
@MaguidhirP Besides you cant turn someone gay, so how can they be groomed to become homosexual. LOL!
@MaguidhirP haha very funny good sir!!! remind me when teaching tolerance became a 'Paedophile sympthiser'? I believe you are wrong.
@MaguidhirP I see your a journalist in your bio. Would you please do your job and report on facts and not blatant negative false stereotypes
Hanging with my friend for #sydneymardigras! Feeling very gay. #lgbt https://t.co/aDr9Tn42bE
Could this be one of the worst kept secrets in #PowerRangers history, is @chrisr3id the new gold ranger?... #NinjaSteel
Hi @MrSlightly74 congrats on the role on #NinjaSteel, definitely wander what your mentor story will be.
@MorphinLegacy Oh, I wouldnt go that far! They just need to (pardon the pun) energise the series..
@PowerRangerTalk What happened now?
I am only saying this once! Lets treat the unemployed better then we already are. #auspol #acossconf2016
@blufyre94 @tweetfromfranky In that same article just a paragraph down under Australia, talks about the origin of the parade.
@blufyre94 @tweetfromfranky Yes, but we are talking about the Australian Mardi Gras, not the one in the US.
URGHH "Activist Takeover" Will @samanthamaiden please understand the roots of Mardi Gras? Thank you!
@tweetfromfranky if you knew me, you would know that every queen has a heart that bleeds light.
@tweetfromfranky finally we agree on something, Gays should have the same rights as heteros. Yay! #PartyTime
@tweetfromfranky We tried that, this year. Clearly didnt work, Now they are changing that. He can hear stories from behind the baracade.
@tweetfromfranky because it would make no sense, given the fact straight people already have all their rights. Thats why.
@tweetfromfranky My evidence, is all the stories of ordinary LGBT australians.
@tweetfromfranky your original comment was about why there is not a straight mardi gras. I am simply replying to that.
@tweetfromfranky you tell me when a straight person has to survey the environment before holding a boyfriends hand?
@tweetfromfranky they are being killed cause they are in straight relationships. I would love evidence of this...
@tweetfromfranky I mean straight marriage. Mardi Gras started on changing the stay of play for all LGBTIQ people in Australia.
@tweetfromfranky marriage equality, no stigma of relationships, heteros arent being killed. Any more reasons...
@tweetfromfranky because straight people have full rights. ....
@ohnoitsreality he is technically not banned from the event, hes just not an official guest. Thats all.
@ShaquilleRay @MSMWatchdog2013 Mardi Gras Founded on Principles of Political Change. Its not just about promoting inclusivity.
Jesus Christ I already have Autism, This world is hard enough to understand, Now Trump is elected. WHAT THE HELL! #ElectionNight
FACT! https://t.co/GcQ4LNryR7
@Katie_Krause I still dont know why elections arent national holidays... OR held on a saturday..
Hey @elonmusk is that space shit ready yet. #ElectionNight
